title: Concepts of AI
why: The Concepts of AI exam introduces foundational artificial intelligence principles through 11 beginner-friendly questions covering core concepts like supervised vs. unsupervised learning, real-world AI applications (voice assistants, recommender systems), and key terminology - providing a clear understanding of how machines simulate human intelligence through labeled data analysis, pattern recognition, and predictive modeling in everyday technologies.

questions.question: Which of the following best defines Artificial Intelligence?
options: The ability of machines to mimic human intelligence
A type of hardware for data storage
questions.correctAnswer: The ability of machines to mimic human intelligence

questions.question: What is a key characteristic of supervised learning?
True or False: Unsupervised learning requires labeled data to train models.
Which of the following is an example of a supervised learning task?
Which type of learning is used to group similar items without prior examples?
What is a common application of AI in daily life?
True or False: Supervised learning predicts outcomes based on input-output pairs.
Which of these is an example of an unsupervised learning application?
What is the main goal of AI?
True or False: AI can only be used in robotics.
